body.name: Portable Steamer for Clothes, Oragerju 2 in 1 Handheld Steamer and Iron, 15s Fast Heat-up, 2 Steam Modes, 1200w Auto Shut-Off Garment Steamer for Travel and Home, 170ML Detachable Water Tank
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 44 mins
features: 1200W Power & 15S Fast Preheating: Compared with ordinary hand-held steamer, this steam iron with a power of 1200w, which can produce steam within 15s, helps get wrinkles out of clothes and fabrics quickly for a fresh, crease-free look.

No leaking & 2 in 1 Steamer: Ordinary clothes steamers tend to spurt or leak water, which can stain and even ruin your garments! Our portable steamer has unique leak-proof design, No leaking, No spilling, allows steam your clothes while hanging vertically or lying horizontally. NOTE: The steamer has steam test before shipping, so there will be some small drops of water left on the inside of the tank.

Foldable and Lightweight Design: This Travel Garment Steamer is a compact and foldable steamer with 1.6lb weight, It is perfect for travel, business trips and home use, and it is easy to put it in any suitcase or backpack. This portable steamer for clothes is a good choice as a gift for family and friends.

Auto Shut-Off: Our travel steamer with detachable 170ml water tank for 18 minutes of continuous steaming to remove wrinkles perfectly. After 8 mins of preheat the steamer and if you don't turning on the steam switch, the steamer will automatic shutdown working status. Returning to standby, the red light flashes to remind you to unplug the power supply or expeditiously use it, in case little baby or someone presses the steam switch by mistake.

Two Steam Modes: The portable steamer is suitable for wool, cotton, fiber, linen, silk, etc. It can also be used for curtain, sofa carpet and bedding steaming. The boot default mode is high steam level, the indicator light from red to blue, and then to green. You can adjust the steam mode according to the fabric. The low steam mode (green lamp) is good for thin fabrics and delicate material clothes, while the high steam mode (blue lamp) is used for thicker fabrics and stubborn wrinkles.

Indicator light: Red light flashes after power on, press to switch button is blue light(high steam mode), press again is green light(low steam mode). After determining the steam mode, the stemer will begin to preheat; The light stops blinking means preheating is complete and then press the steam button, long press more than 3s is continuous steam, fast press twice is bursting steam.

Package Content: 1x Portable Steamer for Clothes,1x Use Manual, 1x Measuring cups. In addition, Oragerju provides 24-hour email contact service,1 year worry-free warranty. If you have any Problems and suggestions, Please contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: ok, it is easy to use. actually does remove rinckles. since it has a small resevoir it will work about 10-15 minutes. fits my hand comforably. one day, however i will upgrade to a larger one. great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: I love the steamer! It works great for shirts, dresses and pants! I have been using it almost ever for getting my husband’s clothes ready for work! No more ironing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I appreciated that this folds for easier suitcase transport but they did flag my bag at one airport due to the steamer and that delayed me going through security. Otherwise it worked well and was easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkle-Free Wonder: Oragerju 2-in-1 Portable Steamer
reviews.reviewText: The built-in water tank is easy to fill and offers a sufficient capacity for extended use. It's also transparent, allowing me to monitor the water level. The device heats up quickly and maintains a consistent temperature, ensuring consistent steam output without any sputtering or water spots on my clothes.The 2-in-1 design incorporates a ceramic-coated soleplate for the ironing function. This adds a layer of precision when working on dress shirts, blouses, or any garments that require a more polished finish. The iron heats up swiftly, and the temperature control allows me to adjust it according to the fabric type, preventing damage or scorching.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Item was used
reviews.reviewText: When I received this item it was used. There was water in the reservoir.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s portable and very efficient to use. It took wrinkles out easily with little effort. So far the quality is great and working as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I’ve never had or used a steamer before, and this one is great! It has two settings in addition to a steam blast. I steamed three sets of curtains, and filled the reservoir three times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I love the container part that holds water. It comes with like this funnel cup that makes it easy to refill. The things I don’t like about it is that the button for the steamer for me is not a good spot. So when you double click that button, it will go to a continuous steam wish is great so you don’t have to hold the bottom. But your finger ends up, pushing the button again and ending the continuous steam because of the steamer being top-heavy, you tend to hold it more towards the top of the steamer handle. You probably can just hold it more on the bottom, but that was harder for my hands. The steam that comes out looks pretty good but I find myself taking a long time to steam one garment so I think the heat isn’t as high as it should be. I also think the heat isn’t as strong because I find myself having to almost put the steamer completely on the garment, almost like to iron it.Also, it’s starting to make a ticking noise the water cup is full. I use distilled water but the ticking noises a little annoying. If the ticking noise gets worse, I’m going to definitely buy another steamer.
WORKS GREAT, VERY VERY HOT AND DOES THE JOB PRETTY FAST.I LOVE IT....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this steamer for my son as a present as I hoped it would make it easier for him to keep his work clothes looking smart and wrinkle free. He was happy to receive such a practical gift and he finds using the steamer much easier than ironing. He uses it on shirts and trousers for work and so far found it to be a good product, easy to use, time saving and lightweight.
Takes a little time to get used to .Once then it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The clothes steamer is a game-changer! Its efficiency in removing wrinkles is unparalleled, saving me significant time compared to traditional ironing especially when travelling with 2 toddlers. The lightweight design and quick heat-up make it incredibly user-friendly. No more struggling with ironing boards and waiting for irons to heat up. It's a must-have for anyone looking to simplify their garment care routine. Totally recommend it 😃
This steamer stopped working bought couple months ago. Tried to email customer care No response received, need replacement as website says this product has one year warranty but no response.
